disclaimer.message.message: This page uses machine translation from English, which may contain errors or unclear language. For the most accurate information, please see the original English version. Some content may be in the original English due to frequent updates. Help us improve this page's translation by joining our effort on Crowdin.
disclaimer.message.description: Machine translation disclaimer for non-English documentation pages

Discover and Engage with Kaia's JSON-RPC.message: Discover and Engage with Kaia's JSON-RPC APIs

Unlock Kaia's full potential with our in.message: Unlock Kaia's full potential with our interactive API documentation. Test API calls directly in the docs, explore detailed request and response examples, and generate code snippets in curl, Python, Node.js, and Java. Whether developing new applications or integrating with existing systems, our comprehensive API reference provides the tools for efficient development on the Kaia platform.

Get started with Kaia's JSON RPC APIs.message: Get started with Kaia's JSON RPC APIs

homepage.sdk.section.description.message: Seamlessly integrate with Kaia Network using our enhanced SDKs for JavaScript, Java, Python and more. Built on trusted foundations like Ethers, Web3.js, Web3j, and Web3.py, our libraries give you the power to submit transactions, read smart contracts, and develop complex applications with extended functionality - all in your preferred programming language.

updatesPage.description.message: This page tracks all significant changes, additions, and updates to the Kaia documentation.

updatesPage.versioningIntro.message: Each documentation change is versioned using Semantic Versioning (SemVer) principles:

updatesPage.majorVersionDesc.message: Fundamental overhauls, complete redesigns, or removal of critical sections that break existing navigation.

updatesPage.minorVersionDesc.message: New site-wide features, language support, major content sections, significant restructuring, and milestone updates.

updatesPage.patchVersionDesc.message: New individual pages, content updates, corrections, and minor UI improvements.
